name: Herblore: A Ludum Dare 46 entry
description:
Race the clock to meet the needs of over a dozen plants as you struggle to keep your business afloat.  The plants are bossy, so you'll have to listen to their every whim to keep them in the best shape possible. Manage your tools and plants, and fight off disease, thirst and hunger to keep them happy.. after all, the healthier the plants - the higher the sale. 

Controls:

  • W / A / S / D: Movement
  • Left Click: Interaction
